name: pg_ttl_index
abstract: Automatic Time-To-Live (TTL) data expiration for PostgreSQL tables
description: A high-performance PostgreSQL extension that provides automatic Time-To-Live (TTL) functionality for data expiration. Features include background worker for automatic cleanup, multi-table support with different expiry times, configurable cleanup intervals, and production-ready implementation with ACID compliance.

pg_ttl_index.abstract: TTL extension functions and background worker
